an6.91:4.1: “Mendicants, a person accomplished in view can’t give rise to six things.
an6.91:4.3: Identity view, doubt, misapprehension of precepts and observances, and forms of greed, hate, and delusion that lead to rebirth in places of loss.
an6.91:4.4: A person accomplished in view can’t give rise to these six things.”
